name: Patagonia Lightweight Crew Sweatshirt - Girls' - Youths
categories: Toddler and child t-shirts and tops
description:
Warmth with the added bonus of retro boxy styling. This sweatshirt will have you remembering Degrassi moments, while the smaller set will just think its cool.Organic cotton, polyester fleece is both durable and quick to dry.Patterning moves shoulder seams out from under heavy bookbag straps.Ribbed cuffs and collar seal in the warmth.Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.Regular fit and retro silhouette with a high-hem and dropped shoulders.
